column5: 3 story 3 Bedroom 3.5 bath private Midtown Town Home built in 2016  - 10 mi (5 miles) from NRG Stadium - Less than a mile walking distance to Houston's premier nightlife (Cle, Axelrad, Proof, House of Blues, etc.) - 12-foot ceilings - Swash Dry Cleaning appliance with 10 pods, 75 inch 4K Samsung TV, Bose Speakers, Whirlpool washer/dryer) - Balcony medium size - On-demand, Netflix, Amazonprime movies, HD DVD
column8: Modern Luxury Midtown Home in PRIME LOCATION
